com.esri.mo2.ui.toc
Interface DataFrame

All Known Implementing Classes:
DataFrameNode
public interface DataFrame

Conceptually A DataFrame is a collection of map layers and presents a geographical area. A Toc object contains at least one DataFrame. A DataFrame has a unique id, and can be activated or deactivated, stores itself map extent.

Method Summary

          Obtains the name of the DataFrame.
